HDG.FS.content: Husserlian idea of “surplus (Überschusses)”: the “is” through which I observe object/substance is a “surplus” re: sensuous affections > categorial just as given as sensuous, thus CATEGORIAL INTUITION > Husserl teaches CI by way of analogy (a measure for correspondence): categorial corresponds to sense data (which is the measure of the analogy)

HDG.FS.content: Marx (like Feuerbach): “criticism of religion ends w/ teaching that man is the highest being for man” > Heidegger’s Marx interpretation not political, concerned w/ Being in manner it destines itself: w/ Marx, position of most extreme nihilism is reached [what about Nietzsche?] > if man is the highest being for man, Being (as Being) is nothing (nichts) (nihil) anymore for man > to understand Marx politically: make politics a mode of self-production (perfectly consistent w/ Marx’s thought) (Marx’s statement decidedly metaphysical)

HDG.LP.content: since Plato, soul suprasensuous (Übersinnlichen), if it appears in sensible world, does so as a castaway (verschlagen) > on Earth, soul doesn’t have the right cast (rechten Schlag), doesn’t belong, is something strange (ein Fremdes) [body is soul’s prison]

HDG.EC.content: not the unnecessary that’s cast into abandonment but we who don’t pay attention to it are abandoned > must learn necessity of unnecessary, & teach it to the people > learning waitful when it is a seeking (Suchen), teaching waitful when advising (Raten)
